meanings.sent1: The sculpture had a clayish texture, feeling smooth and earthy.
meanings.sent2: The clayish soil was perfect for molding into pottery.
meanings.sent3: The clayish mud made squishing sounds under our boots as we walked.
meanings.sent4: Her skin felt clayish, like it could be molded into any shape.
meanings.sent5: The artist's hands were stained with clayish hues after a day of pottery making.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics of clay.
meanings.sent1: The clayish color of the house blended well with the natural surroundings.
meanings.sent2: The vase had a clayish smell, reminding me of the pottery studio.
meanings.sent3: The clayish taste of the soup was unexpected but oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a clayish quality, deep and resonant like fired clay.
meanings.sent5: The clayish texture of the fabric made it feel cool and comforting against the skin.
